biotools.summary: Protein Flexibility Analyzer (pFlexAna) detects and displays conformational changes in remotely related proteins, without using sequence homology information. Rather than detecting regions of structural similarity, pFlexAna detects regions exhibiting structural change.

bioschemas.name: pFlexAna
